anathema: Force anyone into drudgery or mindless work, deny support to loved ones, surrender when escape is an option, destroy a place that has given you shelter
edict: Keep your counsel, follow your heart, appreciate a warm hearth, defend those who welcome you into their home
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Adanye (The Warmth of the Hearth)](/Deities.aspx?ID=673)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries Web Supplement](/Sources.aspx?ID=237) pg. 17

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Mwangi Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=20)

**Edicts** Keep your counsel, follow your heart, appreciate a warm hearth, defend those who welcome you into their home

**Anathema** Force anyone into drudgery or mindless work, deny support to loved ones, surrender when escape is an option, destroy a place that has given you shelter

**Area of Concern**
Hearth, imagination, protection, solitude

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Dexterity or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose holy

**Divine Skill** [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)

**Favored Weapon** [claw](/Weapons.aspx?ID=356) or [Kukri](/Weapons.aspx?ID=413)

**Domains** [Duty](/Domains.aspx?ID=108), [Family](/Domains.aspx?ID=74), [Protection](/Domains.aspx?ID=90), [Repose](/Domains.aspx?ID=116)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Confidence](/Domains.aspx?ID=67), [Fire](/Domains.aspx?ID=76)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Gentle Landing](/Spells.aspx?ID=1542)

- **1st**
[Disguise Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=1491)

- **7th**
[Planar Palace](/Spells.aspx?ID=1634)

</column>
name: Adanye (The Warmth of the Hearth)
